scripts.build: parcel build src/index.js --dist-dir ../express/public && cp src/index-template.html ../express/public/index.html && cp -r src/img ../express/public/
scripts.build:gh-pages: parcel build src/index.js --dist-dir ../express/public --public-url /kanadev00/ && cp src/index-template.html ../express/public/index.html && sed -i.bak 's|href="index.css"|href="/kanadev00/index.css"|g' ../express/public/index.html && sed -i.bak 's|src="index.js"|src="/kanadev00/index.js"|g' ../express/public/index.html && sed -i.bak 's|"/img/|"/kanadev00/img/|g' ../express/public/index.js && cp -r src/img ../express/public/ && rm ../express/public/*.bak
